results.title: Case report of a phencyclidine false positive due to lamotrigine use with confirmatory testing.
results.text_hl: He had a history of @DISEASE_Bipolar_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D001714 @@@Bipolar I@@@, @DISEASE_Stress_Disorders_Post_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D013313 @@@PTSD@@@, @DISEASE_Psychotic_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D011618 @@@schizoaffective disorder@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Marijuana_Abuse</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002189 @@@cannabis@@@/@DISEASE_Opioid_Related_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D009293 @@@opioid abuse@@@.

citations.NLM: Cole J. Case report of a phencyclidine false positive due to lamotrigine use with confirmatory testing. Am J Emerg Med. 2022 Nov;61():234.e5-234.e6. PMID: 35961834
